compiler: : Brandon W. Hawk, Rhode Island College

bibliography_entries.line_html: The relationships between the Latin, Greek, and Armenian versions are not clear, although they all share the same basic narrative structures and distinct parallels with each other.
bibliography_entries.line_text: The relationships between the Latin, Greek, and Armenian versions are not clear, although they all share the same basic narrative structures and distinct parallels with each other.

bibliography_entries.line_html: The Armenian version has been relatively understudied and no critical edition has yet been published, although it survives in eleven manuscripts from the Matenadaran in Yereven:
